amendment.description: To clarify the definition of blocked assets for purposes of the Terrorism Risk Insurance Act of 2002.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1165 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1165 proposed by Senator Allen to Amendment SA 1136. (consideration: CR S9171-9172; text: CR S9171) To clarify the definition of blocked assets for purposes of the Terrorism Risk Insurance Act of 2002.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1165 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1165 proposed by Senator Allen to Amendment SA 1136.
